title: How to cancel EDERA EYEWEAR returns
description: To initiate a return for EDERA EYEWEAR, please follow the instructions provided. Note that only full-priced items are eligible for returns within 14 days of receiving your order. Discounted items and sales are not accepted for returns. Exchanges are not available; instead, return the product and place a new order.

steps_1.title: Return Eligibility Check
steps_1.description:
* Check if your product is full-priced.
* Ensure you are within the 14-day return window after receiving your order.

steps_2.title: Initiate Return via Email
steps_2.description: * Email info@ederaeyewear.com to initiate the return process.

steps_3.title: Product Return Instructions
steps_3.description: * Follow the instructions provided in the email to return your product.

steps_4.title: Place a New Order
steps_4.description: * Place a new order for the desired product, as exchanges are not accepted.

seo_text: Learn how to return a product from EDERA EYEWEAR. This guide provides instructions on initiating a return, eligibility requirements, and the return process. Note that only full-priced items are eligible for returns within 14 days of receiving your order. Discounted items and sales are not accepted for returns. Exchanges are not available; instead, return the product and place a new order.
